item.name: Number of levels
item.definition: Defines the number of subdivision levels beneath the highest level in a text.
item.description: If the text is e.g. divided in parts, which each have chapters, which are divided in paragraphs, the number of levels would be 3. For most emails, the number of levels will be 0 if they are not subdivided. Makes it possible to decide whether the structure has been preserved / characterised. "structure"

item.name: Number of level 1 subdivisions
item.definition: Identifies the number of highest level parts the text is divided in.
item.description: IIf the text has a table of contents, a preface and 3 chapters, this number could be 5. Makes it possible to decide whether the structure has been preserved / characterised, and e.g. no chapters have been lost. "structure"

item.name: Number of footnotes
item.definition: Indicates the number of footnotes in the text.
item.description: Count the number of footnotes in the entire text. "structure"

item.name: Number of footnote references (indicators).
item.definition: Indicates the number of footnote references (indicators).
item.description: Count the number of footnote references (indicators) in the entire text. "structure"

item.name: Use of headers
item.definition: Indicates whether or not headers are used in the text.
item.description: Yes if (one or more) headers are used, no if not. "structure"

item.name: Number of different headers
item.definition: Indicates the number of different headers used in the text.
item.description: Count the number of different headers, e.g. each chapter could have a different header. "structure"

item.name: Use of footers
item.definition: Indicates whether or not footers are used in the text.
item.description: Yes if (one or more) footers are used, no if not. "structure"

item.name: Number of different footers
item.definition: Indicates the number of different footers used in the text.
item.description: Count the number of different footers e.g. each chapter could have a different footer. "structure"

item.name: Number of tables
item.definition: Indicates the number of tables used in the text.
item.description: Count the number of tables. "structure"

item.name: Number of table captions
item.definition: Indicates the number of table captions.
item.description: Count the number of table captions. "structure"

item.name: Number of images
item.definition: Indicates the number of image captions used in the text.
item.description: Count the number of image captions. "structure"

item.name: Number of image captions
item.definition: Indicates the number of images used in the text.
item.description: Count the number of images. "structure"

item.name: Number of graphics
item.definition: Indicates the number of graphics used in the text.
item.description: Count the number of graphics. "structure"

item.name: Number of graphics captions
item.definition: Indicates the number of graphic captions used in the text.
item.description: Count the number of graphic captions. "structure"

item.name: Number of formulas
item.definition: Indicates the number of formulas used in the text.
item.description: Count the number of formulas. "structure"

item.name: Use of signatures
item.definition: Indicates whether or not the text contains signatures.
item.description: Yes if text contains one ore more signatures, no otherwise. "structure"

item.name: Use of signatures
item.definition: Indicates whether or not the text contains any signatures.
item.description: Yes if text contains one ore more signatures, no otherwise. Can be in any form, e.g. digital signature ir watermark-like. "structure"

item.name: Use of watermarks / background images
item.definition: Indicates whether or not the text contains a watermark or background image.
item.description: Yes if text contains (one ore more) watermarks or background images. "structure"

item.name: Number of working hyperlinks
item.definition: Indicates the number of working hyperlinks used in the text.
item.description: Count the number of working hyperlinks. "behaviour"

item.name: Number of pages
item.definition: Defines the number of pages.
item.description: Count the number of pages, including the front page. "appearance"

item.name: Number of lines
item.definition: Defines the number of lines.
item.description: Count the number of lines. "appearance"

item.name: Number of characters
item.definition: Defines the number of characters.
item.description: Count the number of characters. "appearance"

item.name: Page margin-top
item.definition: Unused space at the top of the document above the text.
item.description: "appearance"

item.name: Page margin-right
item.definition: Unused space at the right of the document above the text.
item.description: "appearance"

item.name: Page margin-bottom
item.definition: Unused space at the bottom of the document above the text.
item.description: "appearance"

item.name: Page margin-left
item.definition: Unused space at the left of the document above the text.
item.description: "appearance"

item.name: Page height
item.definition: Total height of the page.
item.description: "appearance"

item.name: Page width
item.definition: Total width of the page.
item.description: "appearance"

item.name: Number of columns
item.definition: Identifies the number of columns.
item.description: Count the number of columns on a page No columns means the number is 1. If there are several instances of "plain text" with different values, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Columns spacing
item.definition: Identifies the white space between two columns.
item.description: Define the unused space between two columns. If there are several values for this property, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Letter / word spacing
item.definition: Identifies the letter / word spacing of plain text.
item.description: Indicate if the white space of a line is evenly distributed between the letters or words. If there are several values for this property, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Paragraph font size
item.definition: Font size of plain text.
item.description: The font size of plain text. If there are several instances of "plain text" with different values, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Paragraph font style
item.definition: Font style of plain text.
item.description: The font style of plain text. If there are several instances of "plain text" with different values, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Paragraph font colour
item.definition: Identifies the font colour of plain text.
item.description: The font colour of plain text. If there are several instances of "plain text" with different values, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Paragraph line spacing
item.definition: Identifies the line spacing of plain text.
item.description: The spacing between two lines of plain text. If there are several instances of "plain text" with different values, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Paragraph spacing-top
item.definition: Identifies the space from top of paragraph to element above.
item.description: Space from top of paragraph to element above. If there are several instances of "plain text" with different values, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Paragraph spacing-right
item.definition: Identifies the space from right of paragraph to element at the right.
item.description: Space from right of paragraph to element at the right. If there are several instances of "plain text" with different values, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Paragraph spacing-bottom
item.definition: Identifies the space from bottom of paragraph to element below.
item.description: Space from right of paragraph to element below. If there are several instances of "plain text" with different values, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Paragraph spacing-left
item.definition: Identifies the space from left of paragraph to element at the left.
item.description: Space from left of paragraph to element at the left. If there are several instances of "plain text" with different values, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Paragraph indentation
item.definition: Identifies the space from page margin to left of first line of paragraph.
item.description: Space from the page margin to the left of the first line of the paragraph. If there are several instances of "plain text" with different values, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Header font size
item.definition: Font size of headers.
item.description: The font size of headers. If there are several instances of headers with different values, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Header font style
item.definition: Font style of headers.
item.description: The font style of headers. If there are several instances of headers with different values, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Header font colour
item.definition: Identifies the font colour of headers.
item.description: The font colour of headers. If there are several instances of headers with different values, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Header line spacing
item.definition: Identifies the line spacing of headers.
item.description: The spacing between two lines of headers. If there are several instances of headers with different values, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Header spacing-top
item.definition: Identifies the space from top of header to element above.
item.description: Space from top of header to element above. If there are several instances of headers with different values, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Header spacing-right
item.definition: Identifies the space from right of header to element at the right.
item.description: Space from right of header to element at the right. If there are several instances of headers with different values, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Header spacing-bottom
item.definition: Identifies the space from bottom of header to element below.
item.description: Space from right of header to element below. If there are several instances of headers with different values, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Header spacing-left
item.definition: Identifies the space from left of Header to element at the left.
item.description: Space from left of header to element at the left. If there are several instances of headers with different values, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Footer font size
item.definition: Font size of footers.
item.description: The font size of footers. If there are several instances of footers with different values, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Footer font style
item.definition: Font style of footers.
item.description: The font style of footers. If there are several instances of footers with different values, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Footer font colour
item.definition: Identifies the font colour of footers.
item.description: The font colour of footers. If there are several instances of footers with different values, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Footer line spacing
item.definition: Identifies the line spacing of footers.
item.description: The spacing between two lines of footers. If there are several instances of footers with different values, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Footer spacing-top
item.definition: Identifies the space from top of footer to element above.
item.description: Space from top of footer to element above. If there are several instances of footers with different values, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Footer spacing-right
item.definition: Identifies the space from right of footer to element at the right.
item.description: Space from right of footer to element at the right. If there are several instances of footers with different values, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Footer spacing-bottom
item.definition: Identifies the space from bottom of footer to element below.
item.description: Space from right of footer to element below. If there are several instances of footers with different values, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Footer spacing-left
item.definition: Identifies the space from left of Footer to element at the left.
item.description: Space from left of footer to element at the left. If there are several instances of footers with different values, choose one to focus on. (for first version) "appearance"

item.name: Human readibility
item.definition: Indicates how well the text is readable.
item.description: Grade how well the text is readable. 1 is very bad, 10 is excellent.

item.name: Machine readability
item.definition: Indicates which percentage of the characters of the text are machine readable.
item.description: Define this value with a reference application, e.g. an OCR-application. 0% means nothing readable, 100% means every character readable.

item.name: Image height
item.definition: Identifies the height of the image.
item.description: Size from top to bottom. "appearance"

item.name: Image width
item.definition: Identifies the width of the image.
item.description: Size from left to right. "appearance"

item.name: Color depth
item.definition: Describes the number of bits used to represent the color of a single pixe
item.description: Can not be determined by visual inspection (you cannot simply see it) but only by a tool.

item.name: Colour space defined
item.definition: Indicates wthether or not the colour space has been defined.
item.description: The colour space defines how an application interpretes the value of a colour. Can not be determined by visual inspection (you cannot simply see it) but only by a tool.

item.name: Size of smallest detail
item.definition: Defines the smallest detail that can be distinguished in an image.
item.description: Can be resolution in a .jpeg or .bmp image, but different for a vector image.

item.name: XCDLimageHeight
item.definition: XCDL property 2
item.description: Height of an image. Corresponds to the y-axis of a Cartesian coordinate system. Measured in pixel. XCDL property 2

item.name: XCDLimageWidth
item.definition: XCDL property 30
item.description: Width of an image. Corresponds to the x-axis. Measured in pixel. XCDL property 30

item.name: XCDLnormData
item.definition: XCDL property 300
item.description: XCL specific data. The normalized data as hex String. XCDL property 300

item.name: XCDLbitsPerSample
item.definition: XCDL property 151
item.description: Number of bits per sample component. Measured in bit. XCDL property 151

item.name: XCDLcompression
item.definition: XCDL property 18
item.description: algorithm applied to image data for the purpose of minimizing storage size as XCLLabel. XCDL property 18

item.name: XCDLimageType
item.definition: XCDL property 20
item.description: Interpretation of image pixels representing the colour type of an image as XCLLabel. XCDL property 20

item.name: XCDLorientation
item.definition: XCDL property 9
item.description: The orientation of the image with respect to the rows and columns as XCLLabel. XCDL property 9

item.name: XCDLplanarConfiguration
item.definition: XCDL property 49
item.description: How the components of each pixel are stored as XCLLabel. XCDL property 49

item.name: XCDLresolutionUnit
item.definition: XCDL property 22
item.description: measure unit for measuring resolution as XCLLabel. XCDL property 22

item.name: XCDLresolutionX
item.definition: XCDL property 23
item.description: number of pixels per resolution unit in horizontal direction. XCDL property 23

item.name: XCDLresolutionY
item.definition: XCDL property 24
item.description: number of pixels per resolution unit in vertical direction. XCDL property 24

item.name: XCDLscanDocName
item.definition: XCDL property 144
item.description: The name of the document from which this image was scanned as String. XCDL property 144

item.name: Audio resolution
item.definition: Describes the band-with
item.description: Describes the band-with

item.name: Tracking
item.definition: p.m.
item.description: p.m.

item.name: Level
item.definition: p.m.
item.description: p.m.

item.name: Dynamic
item.definition: Defines the difference between the loudest and the softest sounds.
item.description: p.m.

item.name: Spectral components
item.description: p.m.

item.name: Contains phasing
item.description: p.m.

item.name: Signal-to-noise-ratio
item.definition: p.m.
item.description: p.m.

item.name: Drop-Out
item.definition: Short periods where the sound is interrupted
item.description: Count or estimate of the avarage number of drop-outs per minute in the audio record.

item.name: Sample Rate
item.definition: Describes how often per second the data source is touched.
item.description: Cannot de defined manually, tool needed.

item.name: Water marking
item.definition: Describes if the objects contains a watermark
item.description: Cannot de defined manually, tool needed.

item.name: Multitrack
item.definition: Descibes the number of channels used in recording the sound.
item.description: Give the number of tracks. Cannot be heard, should be known in advance.

item.name: Speed variance
item.definition: Describes whether the speed gets sometimes a little faster or a little slower.
item.description: p.m.

item.name: Mono/Stereo
item.definition: Describes whether the recording is in mono or in stereo
item.description: p.m.

item.name: Duration
item.definition: Length of recording
item.description: Length of recording, induding "silence" before and after sound.

item.name: Resolution
item.definition: The granularity of the picture
item.description: p.m.

item.name: Picture Drop-Out
item.definition: Small errors in the picture stream, e.g. a short black screen.
item.description: Count or estimate of the avarage number of drop-outs per minute in the video record.

item.name: Sound Drop-Out
item.definition: Small errors in the sound, such as no sound for a short term
item.description: Count or estimate of the avarage number of drop-outs per minute in the video record.

item.name: Picture Aspect Ratio
item.definition: Relation of width to length of a picture
item.description: p.m.

item.name: High Definition
item.definition: Defines if the video conforms to the High Definition standard.
item.description: The amount of information transmitted to the screen. High Definition is the upcoming standard for television sets.

item.name: Frame rate
item.definition: The speed of change between the pictures
item.description: In frames per second

item.name: Stereo
item.definition: Describes whether files are opened with one or two sound channels
item.description: yes for stereo, no for mono.

item.name: Signal representation
item.definition: Indicates the colour representation scheme, such as RGB
item.description: p.m.

item.name: Picture-audio synchronisation
item.definition: Indicates whether sound and the adjusted pictures are shown at exactly the same time.
item.description: p.m.
